CommandletClass: Commandlet class to use for World Partition conversion
InstancedFoliageGridSize: Editor grid size used for instance foliage actors in World Partition worlds
MinimapLowQualityWorldUnitsPerPixelThres: Threshold from which minimap generates a warning if its WorldUnitsPerPixel is above this value
bEnableLoadingInEditor: Whether to enable dynamic loading in the editor through loading regions
bEnableStreamingGenerationLogOnPIE: Whether to enable streaming generation log on PIE
bShowHLODsInEditor: Whether to show HLODs in the editor
bShowHLODsOverLoadedRegions: Control display of HLODs in case actors are loaded
HLODMinDrawDistance: Minimum distance at which HLODs should be displayed in editor
HLODMaxDrawDistance: Maximum distance at which HLODs should be displayed in editor
